scheduled.title: Scheduled Tasks
scheduled.description: Number of scheduled tasks in the batch

in-process.title: In process Tasks
in-process.description: Number of in process tasks in the batch

warning.title: Warning Tasks
warning.description: Number of warning tasks in the batch

failed.title: Failed Tasks
failed.description: Number of failed tasks in the batch

canceled.title: Canceled Tasks
canceled.description: Number of canceled tasks in the batch

completed.title: Completed Tasks
completed.description: Number of completed tasks in the batch

dicomDeviceName.title: Device Name
dicomDeviceName.description: Name of Devices performing tasks in the batch

ExporterID.title: Exporter ID
ExporterID.description: ID of exporters performing tasks in the batch

createdTimeRange.title: Created Time Range
createdTimeRange.description: time range when tasks of the batch were created

updatedTimeRange.title: Updated Time Range
updatedTimeRange.description: time range when tasks of the batch were last updated

scheduledTimeRange.title: Scheduled Time Range
scheduledTimeRange.description: time range when next attempt to process tasks of the batch are scheduled

processingStartTimeRange.title: Processing Start Time Range
processingStartTimeRange.description: time range when last attempt to process tasks of the batch started

processingEndTimeRange.title: Processing End Time Range
processingEndTimeRange.description: time range when last attempt to process tasks of the batch finished
